title: Policy Management Manager (Trưởng Nhóm Quản Lý Hợp Đồng Bảo Hiểm) - Tại Phú Nhuận
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH FULLERTON HEALTH VIỆT NAM
job_description:
Manage and improve the internal processing, including but not limited to ensure:
insured management (new insured, deletion insured, change scale group),
scale compensation management,
correct policy control on system
SLA committed with clients
management of insured card following internal guideline,
Assist to direct manager with planning, coordinating and implementing TPA projects and programs arising from company plans,
Train and develop the skills and the knowledge of the team,
Solve major difficulties meet in the daily activities,
Provide regular, timely weekly team report to direct manager as required,
Provide statistic report requested by corporate customers and respect the timeline committed,
Be involved in the preparation of the training guideline,
Others tasks assigned by the Company.
requirements:
Bachelor’s Degree
2-3 years of experience in Data Control and Team Management
Fluent in English
Computer Literate, WinWord, Excel, Power Point
Analytical and creative problem-solving skills
Advisory and Negotiation skills
Be able to work under pressure
career_tags: Quản lý hợp đồng bảo hiểm
